subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan described the qualifying-round games as an “audition” — and got a reminder of that when he was pulled from Friday’s game at halftime.
snippet: Landon Donovan described the qualifying-round games as an “audition” — and got a reminder of that when he was pulled from Friday’s game at halftime.
